properties.name: Administration municipale de la Ville de Genève Département de la culture Bibliothèques et discothèques municipales Jonction‎
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson bvd Carl-Vogt 22 1205 Genève, SwitzerlandOur closest public library - the one in Jonction.

properties.name: Au Paradoxe Perdu‎
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson place De-Grenus 3The third store selling bande dessinée in a 3 block radius. Not bad, Geneva. Not bad.

properties.name: Bollywood
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson Place de la navigation 6 1201 GeneveFantastic indian food - I especially recommend the samosas, and the tikka masala. Sumptuous dinner for two with a bottle of the house Rose came to CHF 103.00

properties.name: Cafe De La Presse
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson bvd de Saint-Georges 62, 1205 Genève, SwitzerlandA steak-house I\'m told is quite good and cheap - will check it out and report back immediately.

properties.name: Cafe du Soleil
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson place du Petit-Saconnex 6 1209 Genève, Switzerland022 733 34 17 Fine fondue - the finest I\'ve yet had. Be sure to ask for "cheese crust" when you\'re finished and the waiter will take your fondue pot back to the kitchen to brown the remaining cheese into a delicious crunchy solid!

properties.name: Cafe-Creperie Saint Pierre
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson Place de la Taconnerie 6 1204 Geneva, SwitzerlandGreat crepe place - I recommend the cheese/spinach/egg for starters and the banana/sugar/butter for desert. Also - "everybody in Geneva speaks English" my ass.

properties.name: Coup de Girafe
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson The best quiche I\'ve ever had. A spectacular beery brunch place apparently with some great open face sandwiches the rest of the time. Not abysmally expensive.

properties.name: Cumulus
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson rue des Etuves 5 1201 Genève, SwitzerlandThe second comic store I visited in Switzerland (not 10 paces from Oreille Casee) - smaller than the first but possessed of the first erotic comics I\'ve found on the continent. A small rack filled with comically large racks. I think I\'m going to be just fine here.

properties.name: Cupidon
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson bvd de la Cluse 43Recommended comic store in the new hood.

properties.name: Inner City Yoga
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson Rue de Rive 3 1204 Geneva, SwitzerlandPretty great yoga classes for expats - classes taught by great instructors in both English and French. I recommend Patrick\'s classes for a nice ass-kicking.

properties.name: L' Oreille Cassée
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson quai des Bergues 9 1201 Genève, Switzerland022 732 40 80 The first comic book store Brett went to in Switzerland! Pretty exciting! Top floor\'s filled with breathtaking hardcover comics that I\'ve never heard of. Basement filled with breathtaking Manga that I\'ve never heard of. Held off on buying my first French-language comic because I want it to be something really special - also because I don\'t have an apartment to put it.

properties.name: La gaité
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson Rue de la Rôtisserie 13 1204 GenèveA costume shop. Disguises and low cost carnival masks.

properties.name: Libraire Pacific
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson bvd Carl-Vogt 102, 1205 Genève, SwitzerlandA place for discount bande dessinee and more in Plain Palais.

properties.name: Off The Shelf
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson bvd Georges-Favon 15An English language bookstore - expensive and invaluable

properties.name: Sushi Train
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson Rue Neuve-Du-Molard, 21Sushi that comes by on a model train. Duh. 2 rolls steam by per color coded plate: white CH 3.50, Green CH 5.50, Red 7.50 - not mind blowing but nice enough when you come for happy "hour" (7:30 to 10:30) when drinks and rolls are half price. You must sit at the counter with the train to enjoy half price specials.

properties.name: The Library in English
properties.description: Posted by Imbrettjackson Rue de Monthoux 3 1201 Geneva, SwitzerlandEnglish language books are incredibly expensive so it\'s time to rediscover the library! Free to read in - checkouts require 110 CHF memberships for single adults.
